version_description:
1. Added LAN Scan. (Upgrade required).
2. Improved DNS Lookup.
3. Added Logging and Email support for all tasks.
4. Full Version users now can purchase Pro Features in Settings.
5. Bug fixes.

1. Fully redesigned for bigger iPhone and iPad screens.
2. Built for iOS 11.
3. Supports shared Server List among different devices and versions.
4. Now diagnosis logs can be shared through more ways, including email, social networking, Air Drop
